Bmed Lifestyle

Project developed for the clothing brand Bmed where we create a photographic campaign of editorial and e-commerce.
The project was first developed in a studio, with the assistance of art director Filipa Alves, and later abroad, where the campaign was carried out.

Bmed Lifestyle

Bruno Nacarato
